page.title: 12GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Children play many games at home and at school. At home they play Snooker, Pool, Little Soldiers, Star Wars and Action Force. Pool is a game played on a special table with two players and 16 balls - 7 yellow, 7 red, one black and one white. Once someone pots a ball he goes for the other 6 balls. Black is the last to be potted. At school they play rounders, Bull Dogs, Football, Line Tag, Cricket and War. Cricket is a game with 22 players, 11 on each side. One side fields and the other side bats. Two men bat at a time and score runs by hitting a leather ball which is bowled to them. A man is out after being caught, bowled or stumped. The side with the most runs, wins.
